data.name: AboutProg_Description
data.value: I'm open to developing software and creating game repacks. Please send business offers to the email.

data.name: ActInitial_Hint
data.value: Which act will new characters start from?

data.name: DllToLoad_Hint
data.value: Choose .dll file that you would like to load into the game. If you would like to load multiple .dll files, separate them with a vertical bar. Example: BaseMod.dll|D2extra.dll|myD2.dll

data.name: ActiveLaunchAnyNumberOfLOD_Hint
data.value: You'll be able to launch any amount of game instances. Don't activate this option without real need. Keep in mind that modifying the same stash or using the same character from multiple game instances simultaneously can lead to negative side effects.

data.name: ActiveCowPortalWhenCowKingWasKilled
data.value: Allow entering Cow Level multiple times

data.name: ActiveCowPortalWhenCowKingWasKilled_Hint
data.value: By default after killing Cow King and exiting the game, the Cow Level portal will be closed. Activating this option prevents it from closing.

data.name: ShowCounterInAllDifficulty_Hint
data.value: By default message telling that "Stone of Jordan" was sold appears only on Hell difficulty. By activating this option the message will appear on any difficulty.

data.name: SelectMainPageOnOpenning_Hint
data.value: By default PlugY remembers the last opened stats page which will be showed next time you open character stats. Activating this option will always show the first character stats page.

data.name: PrintButtonsBackgroundOnMainStatsPage
data.value: Add border to buttons that switch pages

data.name: ActiveChangeLanguage_Hint
data.value: If your game copy has multiple languages, this option allows activating one of them.

data.name: ActiveSharedGold
data.value: Make stash gold available to all your characters

data.name: ActiveSharedGold_Hint
data.value: By default, every character has his own gold. Activating this option enables using shared gold that is accessible by all your characters.

data.name: ActiveMultiPageStash_Hint
data.value: By default stash has only one page.

data.name: MaxPersonnalPages_Hint
data.value: Number of personal stash pages for every character will be limited to this value.

data.name: MaxSharedPages_Hint
data.value: Shared stash will will be limited to this number of pages. "0" value means unlimited number.

data.name: ActiveSharedStash
data.value: Add stash section that is shared between all your characters

data.name: ActiveSharedStash_Hint
data.value: Adds a toggle to the stash to switch to additional pages that are shared between all your characters.

data.name: SeparateHardcoreStash
data.value: Separate shared stash for hardcore characters

data.name: SeparateHardcoreStash_Hint
data.value: Hardcore characters won't be able to access shared stash of the non-hardcore ones, your hardcore characters will have a separate shared stash.

data.name: SharedStashFilename_Hint
data.value: Filename which contents of shared stash will be stored in. This file will be prefixed with "_LOD_" and have extension ".sss". Note that if you enter new name, existing file won't be renamed automatically, you'll have to do it yourself.

data.name: DisplaySharedSetItemNameInGreen
data.value: Add items from stash to the set item list

data.name: DisplaySharedSetItemNameInGreen_Hint
data.value: Properties of a set item contain list of items belonging to the same set. Activating this option items from your stash will be listed in green in the list too.

data.name: NbPagesPerIndex2_Hint
data.value: Holding Shift button and clicking the skip pages button will skip number of pages you enter.

data.name: NbPagesPerIndex_Hint
data.value: Special button to skip multiple stash pages at once.

data.name: DisableBattleNet_Hint
data.value: It's strongly recommended not to use PlugY on Battle.net as it's quite likely that your account will get banned there.

data.name: ActiveCheckMemory
data.value: Do not launch game unless all features were activated

data.name: ActiveCheckMemory_Hint
data.value: If you choose this option, then on game launch PlugY will check if it could activate all the chosen options. If any of the options failed to activate, the game won't be launched.

data.name: ActivePlugin_Hint
data.value: If you don't choose this option, then no other option will take effect.

data.name: ActiveWorldEvent_Hint
data.value: World event can occur only on the Hell difficulty: Diablo Clone manifests at random time and location. During one game session it may happen no often than once in 41 hours 40 minutes. You must have "Stone of Jordan" to trigger the event.

data.name: ActiveAutoSell_Hint
data.value: Sell counter of "Stone of Jordan" will be incremented by 1 every defined period of time.

data.name: MonsterID_Hint
data.value: By default Diablo Clone is summonned, his ID is "333".

data.name: ItemsToSell
data.value: Item to sell instead of "Stone of Jordan":

data.name: ItemsToSell_Hint
data.value: Set item ID to be used instead of "Stone of Jordan".

data.name: TriggerAtEachSOJSold
data.value: Amount of "Stone of Jordan" sold to activate

data.name: TriggerAtEachSOJSold_Hint
data.value: Required amount of "Stone of Jordan" to be sold to trigger world event.

data.name: OwnSOJSoldChargeFor_Hint
data.value: Sell counter will be increased by this value when you sell "Stone of Jordan".

data.name: TimeBeforeAutoSell
data.value: Time in seconds till possible counter increase:

data.name: GameParam_3dfx_Hint
data.value: Rendering mode for videocards from 3dfx Interactive company. Can potentially be more effective than other videomodes. But sometimes using it can lead to game launch failure.

data.name: GameParam_Direct_Hint
data.value: Read game resources not only from .mpq archives, but also from the "data" folder which take precedence. The "data" folder must be in the same directory as the executable file you use to launch the game. Activating this option is highly recommended.

data.name: GameParam_nosave_Hint
data.value: The game won't save your characters' progress (including experience and items). The only exception is the opened portion of the map.

data.name: GameParam_Ns_Hint
data.value: Disables all game sounds. You won't be able to enable them even from game menu.

data.name: GameParam_skiptobnet_Hint
data.value: After game launch you will be connected to Battle.net. It's strongly recommended not to use PlugY on Battle.net as it's quite likely that your account will get banned there.

data.name: GameParam_sndbkg_Hint
data.value: Game sounds will continue to play even when game window is minimized or not focused.

data.name: GameParam_Txt_Hint
data.value: Before game launch resources in .txt format will be compiled to .bin format that game can use. This option is needed to enable some modifications.

data.name: ColorOfVersionText_Hint
data.value: Game version will be displayed in this color.

data.name: VersionText_Hint
data.value: If you leave this field blank, then game version will be displayed in the bottom left of the game's main menu.

data.name: AlwaysRegenMapInSP
data.value: Generate location maps anew on game launch

data.name: AvailableLanguages_Hint
data.value: List of installed localizations in your game copy.

data.name: ActiveNewStatsInterface_Hint
data.value: Add extra pages to character stats panel that contain extended information about your character.

data.name: ActiveDisplayItemLevel
data.value: Show item level in item properties

data.name: ActiveDisplayItemLevel_Hint
data.value: Hovering mouse over an item will also show its level (ilvl). Main stats depend on the item level.

data.name: Param_Hint
data.value: Parameters start with a dash. Multiple parameters must be separated with space. Example: -w -direct

data.name: AlwaysDisplayLifeAndManaValues_Hint
data.value: By default numeric values of Life and Mana on their orbs aren't displayed.

data.name: DefaultLanguage_Hint
data.value: Use this localization if others aren't available.

data.name: EnabledTXTFilesWhenMSExcelOpenIt_Hint
data.value: .txt files will be accessible even if opened in MS Excel.

data.name: NBPlayersByDefault_Hint
data.value: The more players you play with, the tougher monsters become and the more experience your character gains. Activating this option in single player game you'll receive the same difficulty and experience gain as if you're playing with others.

data.name: Notes1
data.value: Origin point for button positions is in the bottom left corner.

data.name: Notes2
data.value: If the value is negative, the position is assigned default value.

data.name: Library_Hint
data.value: PlugY won't be activated if you don't specify library.

data.name: ColorOfPlugYVersion_Hint
data.value: PlugY version will be displayed in this color.

data.name: ActiveLogFile_Hint
data.value: This option is not recommended because it can degrade game performance.

data.name: ActiveLanguageManagement_Hint
data.value: Use selected localization only if it's installed, otherwise fall back to the default localization.

data.name: ActiveLadderRunewords_Hint
data.value: By default some runewords work only in ladder mode on Battle.net. This option allows using them in any games.

data.name: ActiveSavePathChange
data.value: Change save folder when using PlugY

data.name: SavePath_Hint
data.value: Don't forget to move save files from the previous folder to the one you specify.

data.name: ActiveSkillsUnassignment_Hint
data.value: Gives ability to reset skill points any amount of times at any time without any limitations.

data.name: ActiveSkillPerLevelUp
data.value: Change skill points received per level up

data.name: ActiveSkillPerLevelUp_Hint
data.value: By default, character receives one skill point per level up. Activate this option if you would like to change the amount of points.

data.name: ActiveShiftClickLimit
data.value: Holding Shift button do not use all points

data.name: ActiveShiftClickLimit_Hint
data.value: By default, holding Shift button all free points are used. Activating this option allows you to use a limited value.

data.name: ActiveStatsUnassignment_Hint
data.value: Gives ability to manage stat points any amount of times at any time without any limitations.

data.name: KeyUsed_Hint
data.value: Choose button holding which will decrease invested points into a stat.

data.name: ActiveStatPerLevelUp
data.value: Change stat points received per level up

data.name: ActiveStatPerLevelUp_Hint
data.value: By default character receives 5 stat points on level up.

data.name: ThanksKambala
data.value: for translating UI to English and feedback.

data.name: ThanksLorc
data.value: for creating an excellent icon pack one of which is used as application icon.

data.name: ActiveUberQuest
data.value: Activate ability to participate in Über Quest

data.name: ActiveUberQuest_Hint
data.value: Über Quest is a special event which you can enter only after collecting the necessary ingredients. Climax of the event is the battle against all 3 Prime Evils.

data.name: SelectedLanguage_Hint
data.value: If you select localization that is not installed in your game copy, the game won't launch.

data.name: ActiveDisplayBaseStatsValue_Hint
data.value: Hovering mouse over a stat, you'll see amount of invested points (without magical bonuses from items).

data.name: ActiveSkillsUnassignmentOneForOne_Hint
data.value: Ignore skill points received per level up setting.

data.name: Notes0
data.value: Origin point for window position is in the upper left corner.
